skills.tech_description: I began autonomously studying coding while working as a nurse. My approach is driven by curiosity and diligence.
skills.soft_description: After 5 years in nursing and management, I’ve developed strong interpersonal and leadership skills.

book_reviews.monsters: A mesmerizing graphic novel about a girl obsessed with monster movies and trying to understand her world.
book_reviews.encabanee: A poetic and raw reflection on solitude, wilderness, and inner peace.
book_reviews.ahab: An expansive historical novel exploring the untold story of Captain Ahab’s wife.
book_reviews.florence: A lush, complex tale that blends East and West through magic and storytelling.
